pageProduct.name: Sukin Purely Ageless Firming Mist Toner 125ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

With Pure Ribose, Acai & Goji Berry Extract To Help Firm, Hydrate & Tone The Skin.

Warnings

Avoid Contact With Eyes. If Irritation Occurs Rinse Immediately And Discontinue Use. For External Use Only.

Common Uses

With Pure Ribose, Acai & Goji Berry Extract To Help Firm, Hydrate & Tone The Skin.

Ingredients

Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Glycerin, Ribose, Vanilla Planifolia Fruit Extract, Euterpe Oleracea Fruit Extract (Acai), Lycium Barbarum Fruit Extract (Goji), Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Peel Oil, Citrus Tangerina (Tangerine) Peel Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Vanillin, Polyglyceryl-10 Isostearate, Sodium Dilauramidoglutamide Lysine, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Limonene*, Linalool*.

Directions

Application: Close Eyes And Spray Onto Face And Neck Area For An Instant Refreshing Feel. Can Be Used On Face And Body, Over And Under Lotions, Creams, Oils, Gels And Makeup. Use Throughout The Day To Refresh And Hydrate Dry Skin.
